turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Hi how can i help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi. I'd like to order a drink from Starbucks for pickup.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Great that sounds nice. What kind of coffee?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Mhmm. And did you want that iced or regular?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Got it. So that's a tall caffe latte from starbucks. Can you tell me which one you want to pick it up from?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: On Whittier Boulevard in the city of Whittier.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Got it. I've placed your order with whittier blvd's starbucks. It'll be ready soon.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Your reciept will arrive via text shortly. Have a nice day.
